item.description:
This is a special invitation to the other visionary "mamas" out there dreaming up business ventures to feed their families while saving the world. If you are a woman that dreams big, is told by others your dream is impossible or are simply looking to find the business that fuels your passion then I encourage you to join us for the first in a series of activations that will set you on your path to success.

 

This is a co-creative, collaborative venture of women entrepreneurs who are interested in developing the emerging model of doing business which utilizes "feminine" tactics versus the traditional, competitive model that dominates the market today. If you feel called this is the first step. All you have to do is SHOW UP.

 

There will be a 30 minute introductory talk followed by presentations of other female entrepreneurs. Bring an open mind, business cards, ideas and prepare to take flight.

 

$5 donation goes towards the use of our community space
item.name: Mamapreneur Activation - for women only
